## Hypothesis test for Linear Regresssion

Is the explanatory variable a significant predictor of the response variable

```{r}
b0 <- 9.2076
b1 <- 0.9014
se <- .0963
null <- 0
(t <- (b1 - null) / se)

n <- 27
dF <- n - 2
pt(t, dF, lower.tail = F)*2
```

## CI for the slope

```{r}
pe <- b1
(t.crit <- abs(qt(p = .025, df = dF)))
mOe <- t.crit*se
(lower <- pe - mOe)
(upper <- pe + mOe)
```
